<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Pivot Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=1198) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=15" />
<trait label="Open" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=123" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 75</row>

**Archetype** [Staff Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=37)

**Prerequisites**
[Staff Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1193)

**Requirements**
You are wielding your staff.

</column>

---

You [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) and then Strike using your staff. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage for the Strike equal to twice the number of weapon damage dice. Regardless of whether your Strike hit, you can then attempt to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) the target.
name: Pivot Strike
